original_title: Zonsopgang over de onsterfelijke stad Rome
overview: "Daybreak in Rome, expressed in nature shots (mountains, the Tiber, the sea) and street scenes (street lights going out, city coming alive), hour by hour. Images from St. Peter's Square and St. Peter's Church, Castel Sant'Angelo, Forum, Colosseum and more. Lasso act, acrobatics and fire eater in the Alhambra theater. Moreover, it also contains images of Washington, D.C." -EYE.
title: Sunrise Over the Immortal City of Rome
